column5: I know each person going into Canada is allowed a case of beer. But I assume there is some kind of age restriction. How old do you have to be?thanks
[font size="1" color="#FF0000"]LAST EDITED ON May-23-01 AT 08:45PM (CST)[/font][p]Make sure you have picture ID for the 19 year olds.Tim Blanchette
The age for taking beer into Ontario is 19.Tim BlanchetteCadott, WI
Some provinces the legal age is 18, others it is 19.
